title: What is the synonym of 'pretenses'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bear in mind that the singular is ‘pretence’ for which we could substitute: acting, posturing, make-believe, dissembling, play-acting, deception, deceit, trickery, dishonesty, hypocrisy, semblance, affectation, guise, facade or anything that is the opposite of honesty. Bear in mind that all of the foregoing are not necessarily perfectly synonymous with each other and context should be considered because English has many fine shades of meaning.
